Weapon.Name: Crescent Blade
Weapon.Description: A rare blade that curves like the moon, its edge gleams with a light unseen.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With a swift arc, the blade carves the air, leaving a trail of blood.

Weapon.Name: Starlit Staff
Weapon.Description: Embedded with a crystal that pulses with starlight, this staff enhances magical affinity.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: Stars descend upon the foe, hindering their advance.

Weapon.Name: Whisperwind Daggers
Weapon.Description: Forged from the essence of the wind, these daggers strike with silence and precision.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The enemy is caught off-guard, unaware of the impending strike.
